source: His work are also well cited in the literature, well up to the frontier of research.
target: 他的作品在文献中也被很好地引用，直到研究的前沿。

source: He has also demonstrated a wide range of inter-disciplinary skill, in theory, and in applied work.
target: 他还在理论和应用工作中展示了广泛的跨学科技能。

source: The breath of his knowledge are undoubtedly exceptional.
target: 他的知识气息无疑是特殊的。
